channel.title: blogging on sytzez
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on sytzez

item.title: Initial post
item.description: I’ve been thinking a while about starting a blog to get various ideas out there in the world, whether they be about programming, music or other things. Getting content out there on ’the web’ might help me promote the things I’m doing, attract likeminded people or people that can help me in my endeavours, and it can help me hold myself accountable to the ideas I get and the goals I set for myself.
